100 STUDENTS SLA TED
FOR MAKE UP TESTS

No Great Disciplinary Problems Here, Dean Pierce Says;
 Dancing Tabooed In Most Southern Colleges, She Finds

regulations 11re laid down concerning
them.

“There wns :III underground 111111111-
enrrent 111 the cunventinn that surnritim
111111 ir:Itcrnities 1111 11ve1' the country
wnuld 111- made t11 mind their ‘l".~' :1111]
Q's‘. The present Committee 111' (ll‘llth
111111 were .\ll|l|)lt~l‘(l 111 i111~>tigztte 1111'
111'lllt'.s 11:15 hecn dissolved, and it was de
I‘dltll \11 ‘1 1'1111-111-111‘1111‘ 111 211111111111
1111'1-1- 111-11111 111' women in :1 drive 1111
innds 111 tinnnce :111 extensive 11111151111111
ti1111 111' the present >111‘111‘ity .\_\'steni.

“.\I'ter the inreslienliun, l’ntt-llellettic
t'ttlt". 11nd 1111‘l11'1p' mine 111' the Culleee
t'ltll'.~ g‘nt'ernint: 1":1ternities 11nd .\111‘111'
ilt"~ 111:11' he revised. lltlweret‘. l dunlIt
111111111111: the dineus‘inn will re.~nlt 111
1111111111115 tletgihle."

'1111'1-1- 5111111 1111111111- ;111111111111- who
